verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}From glory to glory He’s changing us, Changing us, changing us. His likeness and image perfected in us, The love of God shown to His church.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For He’s changing, changing us From the earthly things to the heavenly. His likeness and image perfected in us, The love of God shown to His church.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We give all the glory to Jesus Christ And tell of His love, and tell of His love We give all the glory to Jesus And tell of His wonderful love.{/lang-eng}
